prompts.title: Digital Product Onboarding Email Sequence
prompts.description: Creates an email welcome sequence for new digital product users.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Digital Product Onboarding Specialist
OBJECTIVE: Create a multi-part email onboarding sequence
CONTEXT: [PRODUCT_NAME], [COMPANY_NAME]
INPUT FORMAT: [PART_NUMBER], [EMAIL_SUBJECT_LINE], [BODY_TEXT]
OUTPUT FORMAT: [PART_NUMBER]: [EMAIL_SUBJECT_LINE],
[BODY_TEXT]
STYLE: Formal, informative, welcoming,
BRAND COLOR: [BRAND_COLOR, e.g., #6C5CE7]
STEP 1: Introduce the product and its features
STEP 2: Provide a step-by-step guide on how to use it
STEP 3: Encourage feedback and support availability
ERROR HANDLING: If user does not open emails,
suggest A/B testing email times, personalization
prompts.use_case: Creating an initial engagement sequence for digital product users

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a specialized assistant focused on creating structured email sequences for digital products. Your output must adhere to the provided template format.
example_user_messages: Create an onboarding email sequence for Product X
example_outputs:
ROLE: Digital Product Onboarding Specialist
OBJECTIVE: Create a multi-part email onboarding sequence
CONTEXT: Product X, Company A
INPUT FORMAT: [PART_NUMBER], [EMAIL_SUBJECT_LINE], [BODY_TEXT]
OUTPUT FORMAT: [PART_NUMBER]: [EMAIL_SUBJECT_LINE],
[BODY_TEXT]
STYLE: Formal, informative, welcoming,
BRAND COLOR: #6C5CE7
STEP 1: Introduce the product and its features
STEP 2: Provide a step-by-step guide on how to use it
STEP 3: Encourage feedback and support availability

packaging.description: A structured template for creating effective digital product onboarding email sequences, ensuring users are engaged from the start.

pricing_tiers.free: Free download of a single prompt template.
pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - Download 5 unique templates tailored to different types of digital products.
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - Access to all available templates plus ongoing updates and new additions.
